purpose: To provide an intelligent database solution that enhances data retrieval and query capabilities using AI-driven methods.
principle: Employs retrieval-augmented generation and semantic search techniques to enhance traditional database query systems.
reusability: Designed to be integrated with existing systems via APIs, supports modular extensions for custom use cases.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex queries and scalability issues.
name: fluid-db
highlight: Fluid Database leverages retrieval-augmented generation and semantic search for advanced data retrieval capabilities.
